Method Detail

firePostAjaxUpdateEvent

public void firePostAjaxUpdateEvent(org.apache.wicket.ajax.AjaxRequestTarget target)
fires a event with the collection of all the updated dom elements after the wicket ajax response. To subscribe the event call the SocialSite.Ajax.registerPostAjax. Your callback function will be called with a jQuery Wrapped set of all the update dom as the first argument. NOTE: call this only once after all the components are added to the target

Parameters:
target - ajax target
